chart.name: chart-customer-per-state
chart.title: Customer per state
chart.dataset: SELECT state.name as state_name, count(distinct partner_addr.id) as partner_count FROM gst_state state LEFT JOIN base_address address on address.state = state.id LEFT JOIN( SELECT partner.id, pa.address as addr FROM base_partner partner LEFT JOIN base_partner_address pa on partner.id = pa.partner WHERE partner.is_customer = true ) partner_addr on address.id = partner_addr.addr GROUP BY state.name

chart.name: chart-unpaid-invoice-per-customer
chart.title: paid invoices per customer
chart.dataset: SELECT partner.name as p_name, count(inv.id) as invoice_count FROM base_partner partner LEFT JOIN( SELECT invoice.id as id ,invoice.partner as p FROM account_invoice invoice WHERE invoice.status_select NOT IN (3,4) AND invoice.invoice_date between DATE(:fromDate) AND DATE(:toDate) ) inv on inv.p = partner.id WHERE partner.is_customer = true GROUP BY partner.name

chart.name: chart-paid-invoice-per-customer
chart.title: Unpaid invoices per customer
chart.dataset: SELECT partner.name as p_name, count(inv.id) as invoice_count FROM base_partner partner LEFT JOIN( SELECT invoice.id as id ,invoice.partner as p FROM account_invoice invoice WHERE invoice.status_select IN (3,4) AND invoice.invoice_date between DATE(:fromDate) AND DATE(:toDate) ) inv on inv.p = partner.id WHERE partner.is_customer = true GROUP BY partner.name
